map.dungeon.name: Labyrinth of Echoes
map.dungeon.description: A mysterious underground complex filled with echoes of forgotten times. It features 15 interconnected rooms allowing movement in all directions.
map.dungeon.rooms.room1.name: Entrance Hall
map.dungeon.rooms.room1.description: The grand entrance with faded murals on the walls and a large, rusty gate.
map.dungeon.rooms.room2.name: Guardian's Foyer
map.dungeon.rooms.room2.description: A room that once housed guardians, with armor stands and weapon racks.
map.dungeon.rooms.room3.name: Chamber of Whispers
map.dungeon.rooms.room3.description: This chamber amplifies the faintest sounds, creating a cacophony of whispers.
map.dungeon.rooms.room4.name: Hall of Mirrors
map.dungeon.rooms.room4.description: Mirrors line every side of the hall, some magical and others merely reflective.
map.dungeon.rooms.room5.name: Garden of Silence
map.dungeon.rooms.room5.description: A serene garden overgrown with unusual, silent plants.
map.dungeon.rooms.room6.name: Crypt of Echoes
map.dungeon.rooms.room6.description: An eerie crypt where echos linger, resonating with the secrets of the past.
map.dungeon.rooms.room7.name: Lair of the Gorgon
map.dungeon.rooms.room7.description: A fearsome lair filled with petrified statues, victims of the gorgon's gaze.
map.dungeon.rooms.room8.name: Library of Riddles
map.dungeon.rooms.room8.description: Ancient tomes fill the shelves, along with puzzles and riddles that protect the knowledge.
map.dungeon.rooms.room9.name: Reflecting Pool
map.dungeon.rooms.room9.description: A still pool of water that perfectly reflects the room, hiding secret depths below.
map.dungeon.rooms.room10.name: Elemental Crossroads
map.dungeon.rooms.room10.description: A room where the four elements meet in harmony, each occupying a quadrant.
map.dungeon.rooms.room11.name: Chamber of the Fallen
map.dungeon.rooms.room11.description: A memorial chamber honoring legendary heroes, with statues and plaques adorning the space.
map.dungeon.rooms.room12.name: Goblin's Den
map.dungeon.rooms.room12.description: A foul-smelling den crudely furnished, currently home to a tribe of tricky goblins.
map.dungeon.rooms.room13.name: Trove of the Lost
map.dungeon.rooms.room13.description: A treasure room filled with the loot of adventurers who never made it out.
map.dungeon.rooms.room14.name: Sanctuary of Shadows
map.dungeon.rooms.room14.description: A solemn sanctuary where shadows dance, casting strange forms on the walls.
map.dungeon.rooms.room15.name: Heart of the Labyrinth
map.dungeon.rooms.room15.description: The deepest chamber of the dungeon, where the most secrets lie hidden, pulsating with an ancient power.
